definition: how can this be so? (idiom); preposterous/ridiculous/absurd
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
how? (emphatic question)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
this/these
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: And now, if you please, I've been told I'm to get nothing for my work.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，真是岂有此理，听说我是白干工作毫无报酬。

sentences.english: Daniel Heh heh, kids say the darnedest things.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔嘿，嘿，孩子们说的是岂有此理的事情。

sentences.english: There is no logic in spending money on useless things.
sentences.chinese: 把钱用在无益处之事，岂有此理。
